statements.query: MATCH (i:GCPSQLInstance{exposed_internet:true})<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject{id: $GCP_PROJECT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WITH i LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE REMOVE i.exposed_internet, i.exposed_internet_type return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (i:GCPSQLInstance)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject{id: $GCP_PROJECT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) 
WHERE '0.0.0.0/0' IN i.authorized_networks 
SET i.exposed_internet = true, i.exposed_internet_type = coalesce(i.exposed_internet_type, []) + 'unrestricted_access'

name: GCP SQL Instance unrestricted access analysis
